titles.title: Distinguished Flying Cross National Memorial Act
A bill to designate a Distinguished Flying Cross National Memorial at the March Field Air Museum in Riverside, California.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 4/29/2010--Introduced. Distinguished Flying Cross National Memorial Act - Designates a memorial currently under construction at March Field Air Museum in Riverside, California, as the Distinguished Flying Cross National Memorial, in honor of current and former members of the armed forces who have been awarded the Distinguished Flying Cross.
